column5: 608 square feet of simple living on the hill that overlooks the landmark Pennybacker Bridge. Enjoy the TV, dart board, kitchen, and patio, and take advantage of the pool, gym, hot tub, and gorgeous views from around Shepherd Mountain.  This home is stacked with books and cooking gear and the perfect cozy spot situated just far enough outside the bustle to be quiet but not to far from the heart of town.
column8: Literary Room Nestled in the Hills
